summary: PROBLEMS WITH BRAKE SYSTEM ON 2003 HONDA CIVIC EX. CONSUMER HAD TO PUMP THE BRAKES TO GET THEM TO RESPOND. *MR   PH THIS IS AN INTERMITTENT PROBLEM.   ONE TIME WAS GETTING OFF FREEWAY AND ANOTHER TIME AT THE DEALERSHIP WHEN DAUGHTER WAS DRIVING.  AT DEALERSHIP VEHICLE CRASH WHILE PULLING IN.  DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  VEHICLE WAS SUBSEQUESTLY SOLD BECAUSE OF THIS.CW
